altTitles.es: La chica de la orilla del mar

description.en:
Koume Sato and Keisuke Isobe are two teenagers living in a sleepy seaside town. After getting used and dumped by her crush the emotionally damaged Koume decides to start a sexual relationship with Keisuke, without any emotions involved. However, they both soon discover that sex with no strings attached does lead to unexpected complications, not just for themselves but also the people surrounding them.

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/a-girl-on-the-shore/)
description.es: Koume Sato y Keisuke Isobe son dos adolescentes que viven en una ciudad costera soñolienta. Después de acostumbrarse y ser abandonado por su enamoramiento, el emocionalmente dañado Koume decide comenzar una relación sexual con Keisuke, sin ninguna emoción involucrada. Sin embargo, ambos descubren pronto que el sexo sin ataduras conduce a complicaciones inesperadas, no sólo para ellos sino también para las personas que los rodean.

biography.en:
Associated Names:
• Асано Инио
• 浅野一二〇

Name (in native language):
• 浅野いにお

Birth Date:
• September 22, 1980

Birth Place:
• Ibaraki, Japan

Previously worked as Takahashi Shin’s assistant on Saishuu Heiki Kanojo.

Asano created the acclaimed manga Solanin, which was released as a feature film in Japan in April 2010, starring Aoi Miyazaki. Known for creating character-driven, realist stories, ranging from slice of life to psychological horror, Asano won first prize in the 2001 GX competition for young manga artists. Yomiuri Shimbun described Asano as "one of the voices of his generation."

Satou Satsuki and Atsumori Ran were his assistants.

Married to Torikai Akane
